item.title: Five minute hacks: Swapping left and right headphone audio in wireplumber
item.description: I’m on Fedora 37 at the moment. My headphone audio is backwards. How do we fix it? I’ve apparently never found the right magic until now. The Setup: I have a crappy “couch computer”. It’s used for casual internet browsing and video watching. It has an analog audio out which goes to my speakers. I’d like to use headphones for when I don’t want to annoy my neighbours. I have a pair of wireless headphones that I got for free, but the battery doesn’t last longer than an hour.
